title: "Microsoft: We're taking over Windows 10 PyTorch AI library from Facebook"
excerpt: "Facebook has used PyTorch and deep-learning framework Caffe2 for Translate, an AI tool that powers translations for the 48 most commonly used languages on Facebook. PyTorch, as the name suggests, is a package for the hugely popular Python programming language."
